whyRentera.title: Renterya is more than listings
whyRentera.subtitle: We removed chaos from the rental process and made it modern: transparent, manageable, and without unnecessary people.
whyRentera.body: Housing rental is often complicated by endless calls, intermediaries, and additional fees. Renterya was created so that only direct contact remains between owner and renter — without third parties and unnecessary costs.

1.title: Direct contact, no intermediaries
1.desc: Communicate directly with the owner in chat — quickly and without extra steps.

2.title: Order in details
2.desc: Terms, rules, and agreements — clear and structured.

3.title: Online contract — not later, but immediately
3.desc: Once everything is agreed and you have checked the housing, signing happens online directly on the platform.

4.title: Payments — simple and regular
4.desc: Online payments and payment history — without reminders or unnecessary messages.

docsPayments.title: Contract, payments, and protection — without extra stress
docsPayments.subtitle: Renterya helps make renting clear and calm from day one.

contract.title: Online contract
contract.body: Sign the contract online directly on the platform — without paperwork, scans, or confusion. Rental terms are fixed and accessible at any time.

bullets.1: everything is clear from day one
bullets.3: the contract is always at hand

payments.title: Online payments
payments.body: Pay rent online — regularly and conveniently. Payment history is stored in your account.

protection.title: Property protection
protection.body: The option to move in without a large deposit — paying rent and a small monthly contribution to Renterya’s partner insurance fund.

community.title: A living community — when there’s someone to ask
community.subtitle: Renterya is not only about finding housing. It’s a space where people support each other and share experience.
community.body: Moving and renting always raise questions. In the Renterya community, you can find answers, advice, and real stories from people who have already gone through this journey.

1.title: Advice and experience
1.desc: Moving, living, and rental experience — short, human, and without unnecessary theory.

2.title: Questions and answers
2.desc: Ask and receive answers from the community — when you need clarity quickly.

3.title: Real stories and cases
3.desc: Read stories from other renters — their successes, mistakes, and useful life hacks.

4.title: Share your story
4.desc: Share your rental experience, tips, and life hacks with other community members.

5.title: Find a roommate
5.desc: Find a person for shared living through the community — reliable and with similar interests.

6.title: Local recommendations
6.desc: Tips from locals — where to live, what to know, and how to adapt.

community.tagline: Live community. Real people. Genuine support.
